channel.title: ASX:EVN on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in ASX:EVN on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Evolution Mining’s Profit More Than Doubles on Gold’s Surge
item.description: Evolution Mining Ltd.’s full-year profit more than doubled to a record, with Australia’s second-biggest gold miner boosted by a surge in prices of the precious metal.
